name: Bullfighting: Street Corrida
description:
Turn into a furious beast in Bullfighting 3D game!
Destroy everything on your way and put people on your horns! Sounds exciting, doesn't it?

REMEMBER:
- the bull runs non-stop and you are to tap at the right moment;
- you are limited in time, so react fast;
- collect bonuses that prolong your time to manage a longer distance.

Run after the crowd of people and put them on your horns!

FEATURES:
- Dynamic runner for pleasant pastime;
- Funny animations;
- Great bonuses make the game even more interesting;
- Destroy everything and mess around as much as you want to.
